QUESTION:
### Description:

 Remove all exclamation marks from sentence except at the end.

### Examples

```
remove("Hi!") == "Hi!"
remove("Hi!!!") == "Hi!!!"
remove("!Hi") == "Hi"
remove("!Hi!") == "Hi!"
remove("Hi! Hi!") == "Hi Hi!"
remove("Hi") == "Hi"
```
